commit_scope: Unblock hosted self-improve execution by auto-falling back from Codex OAuth to API-key auth on refresh_token_reused failures, with per-task auth override support and regression tests for fallback scheduling.

commands: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_agent_runner_tool_failure_telemetry.py -k "codex_oauth or auth_override or model_not_found_fallback"

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting merge/deploy of auth fallback and hosted self-improve run artifact proving impl+verify+deploy chain completion.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Hosted runner retries Codex auth failures with api_key mode instead of stalling on refresh_token_reused oauth failures.
test_flows: Trigger Self Improve Cycle and observe spec->impl progression with hosted runner worker_id present.
Observe oauth refresh-token failure converted into api_key fallback retry instead of repeated oauth-only failure.
Confirm runtime success proof areas remain >=75% for tracked hosted execution endpoints.
